instructions.name: reset_fee_sharing_config
docs: Reset Fee Sharing Config, make sure to distribute all the fees before calling this

instructions.name: update_fee_config
docs: Set/Replace fee parameters entirely (only callable by admin)

instructions.name: update_fee_shares
docs: Update Fee Shares, make sure to distribute all the fees before calling this

instructions.name: upsert_fee_tiers
docs: Update or expand fee tiers (only callable by admin)

errors.name: UnauthorizedProgram
errors.msg: Only Pump and PumpSwap programs can call this instruction

errors.name: FeeTiersNotSorted
errors.msg: Fee tiers must be sorted by market cap threshold (ascending)

errors.name: SharingConfigAdminRevoked
errors.msg: Sharing config admin has been revoked

errors.name: InvalidShareTotal
errors.msg: Invalid share total - must equal 10_000 basis points

errors.name: NotAuthorized
errors.msg: The given account is not authorized to execute this instruction.

errors.name: SharingConfigNotActive
errors.msg: Fee sharing config is not active

errors.name: AmmAccountsRequiredForGraduatedCoin
errors.msg: AMM accounts are required for graduated coins

errors.name: ShareholderAccountMismatch
errors.msg: Remaining account key doesn't match shareholder address

fields.name: admin
docs: The admin account that can update the fee config

fields.name: flat_fees
docs: The flat fees for non-pump pools

fields.name: user_id
docs: Max 20 characters to fit u64::MAX (18,446,744,073,709,551,615) as a string.
Actual storage: 4 bytes (length prefix) + 20 bytes (content) = 24 bytes.
